main_title: Tens of Thousands Executed: The Witch Hunts
hook: [shocked] Imagine 60,000 innocent lives lost! Between 1450 and 1750, Europe was gripped by witch hunts fueled by paranoia.
description: Over 60,000 lives claimed in the witch hunts fueled by fear and superstition. What happened to those innocent victims? #WitchHunts #History #PendleTrials
